plot: After more than thirty years of absence, three Korean women return with their German husbands to their old homeland - to a land that is no longer theirs.
title: Endstation der Sehnsüchte
plot_es: After more than thirty years of absence, three Korean women return with their German husbands to their old homeland - to a land that is no longer theirs.
plot_en: After more than thirty years of absence, three Korean women return with their German husbands to their old homeland - to a land that is no longer theirs.
